concept.title: Starting, restarting, stopping, and viewing the status of
concept.shortdesc: You can start, restart and stop the process by using . You can restart and stop the process by using the .

conbody.p:
The status of the process determines what actions can be carried out. You can view the process status by using a , or by using the .
To start the process, MQConnectivity must be enabled or the process will fail to start. Setting MQConnectivityEnabled to true automatically starts the process.
If the process status is Inactive, and MQConnectivityEnabled is true you can start or restart the process.
If the process status is Active, the process is running. You can stop the process.
